Select between analytic and numeric Jacobians at a solution.

choose_jacobian.Rd

Evaluates the supplied analytic and numeric Jacobian functions at the target parameter vector, reports the preferred matrix, and summarises diagnostic metrics such as the condition number and relative difference.

Usage

choose_jacobian(analytic_fun, numeric_fun, at)

Arguments

analytic_fun

Function returning an analytic Jacobian; may be `NULL`.

numeric_fun

Function returning a numerical Jacobian.

at

Numeric vector at which both Jacobians are evaluated.

Value

A list with entries `A` (chosen matrix), `A_analytic`, `A_numeric`, `source`, `kappa`, and `rel_diff`.
